name: Hong Kong 97 Gameboy (ROM)
description:
Complete demake  of the SNES game for GAMEBOY. 

This is a Game Boy rom (.gb file). It can only be played in a Game Boy or Game Boy color emulator, or on "real hardware" with a "flashcart". 

Don't want to download? Play in your browser: 

https://jwgllc.itch.io/hong-kong-97-gameboy-browser

JWG.LLC Rated T: Homicide, Offensive source material
